'''Beta 1.12.0.12''' is the eighth beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.12.0]], released on June 17, 2019,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360029584791|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.12.0.12 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)|date=June 17, 2019}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
'''Crashes'''
* Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay.
* Fixed a crash that could occur when viewing the skin picker.

'''General'''
* Skin packs now correctly show the number of skins included.
* Scrolling through the skin picker now works correctly.
* Fixed an issue that was preventing skins from showing correctly in the Marketplace.

'''Add-ons and scripting engine'''
* The "{{cd|NearestAttackableTargetGoal}}" component now correctly reselects targets.</onlyinclude>
